post.description: Create a new agent with the specified configuration.
Creates a versioned version of an agent

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: The agent ID of the agent to migrate, if this agent is not a template, it will create a agent template from the agent provided as well

preserve_tool_variables.description: If true, preserves the existing agent's tool environment variables when migrating deployed agents

post.description: Migrate an agent to a new versioned agent template

variables.description: If you chose to not preserve core memories, you should provide the new variables for the core memories

preserve_tool_variables.description: If true, preserves the existing agent's tool environment variables instead of using the template's variables

enum: Agent provided is a template or not found, you can only migrate deployed agents
Template version provided does not exist
You can only migrate agents to a new versioned agent template that belongs to the same project

get.description: Get an agent by its ID

delete.description: Delete an agent by its ID

post.description: Create a template from an agent

get.description: Get the variables associated with an agent

post.description: Creates an Agent or multiple Agents from a template

parameters.name: template_version
parameters.description: The template version, formatted as {template-name}:{version-number} or {template-name}:latest

tags.description: The tags to assign to the agent

agent_name.description: The name of the agent, optional otherwise a random one will be assigned

initial_message_sequence.description: Set an initial sequence of messages, if not provided, the agent will start with the default message sequence, if an empty array is provided, the agent will start with no messages

memory_variables.description: The memory variables to assign to the agent

tool_variables.description: The tool variables to assign to the agent

identity_ids.description: The identity ids to assign to the agent

template_deployment_slug.description: The full name of the template, including version and project slug

post.description: Create a new client side access token with the specified configuration.

hostname.description: The hostname of the client side application. Please specify the full URL including the protocol (http or https).

expires_at.description: The expiration date of the token. If not provided, the token will expire in 5 minutes

get.description: List all client side access tokens for the current account. This is only available for cloud users.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: The agent ID to filter tokens by. If provided, only tokens for this agent will be returned.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset for pagination. Defaults to 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of tokens to return per page. Defaults to 10.

delete.description: Delete a client side access token.
